{{Quote|[[Galadriel]] considers a proposition. [[Elendil]] faces [[Trial by Abyss|judgment]]. [[The Stranger]] finds himself at a crossroads. [[Sauron]]'s plans bear fruit.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''Where Is He?''' is the fourteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the sixth episode of the second season and it was released on [[19 September|September 19]], [[2024]].
